content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Crude Oil Extraction Structure at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of pumpjack at position (17.5, 40.5)

### Electricity Generator at position(-4.5, 0.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5), boiler at position (-7.5, 0.0), steam engine at position (-4.5, 0.5) and a pipe group connecting them at positions [(-6.5, -2.5), (-4.5, -2.5), (-5.5, -2.5), (-6.5, -1.5)]

### New Electricity Generator at position(-8.5, 12.5)
Consists of steam engine at position (-8.5, 12.5), boiler at position (-8.5, 8.0), stone furnace at position (-6.0, 8.0) and a pipe at position (-8.5, 9.5)

### Another Electricity Generator at position(-4.5, 11.5)
Consists of boiler at position (-4.5, 10.0) and steam engine at position (-4.5, 11.5)

### New Electricity Generator at position(-9.5, 1.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position (-9.5, 1.5) and boiler at position (-7.5, 2.0)

### Power Distribution Structure
Consists of small electric poles at various positions including (-2.5, 1.5), (13.5, 17.5), (15.5, 19.5), (18.5, 36.5), (21.5, 35.5), (15.5, 36.5), (4.5, 38.5), (15.5, 39.5), (5.5, 46.5), (9.5, 46.5), (9.954545454545455, 41.68181818181818), (13.52127659574468, 26.414893617021278), (-6.5, 11.5), (-6.5, 13.5), (-6.5, 17.5), (4.5, 38.5), (5.5, 44.5), (5.5, 46.5), (9.5, 46.5) connecting the steam engine to the pumpjack, oil refinery and chemical plant

### Oil Processing Structure at position(7.5, 40.5)
Consists of oil refinery at position (7.5, 40.5) and a pipe group connecting pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) to oil refinery at positions [(11.5, 39.5), (12.5, 39.5), (12.5, 38.5), ..., (9.5, 43.5), (10.5, 43.5), (10.5, 42.5)]

### Chemical Plant Structure at position(7.5, 45.5)
Consists of chemical plant at position (7.5, 45.5) and a pipe connecting oil refinery at (7.5, 40.5) to chemical plant at positions [(8.5, 43.5), (9.5, 43.5)]

### Iron Plate Production Structure at position(-6.0, 8.0)
Consists of stone furnace at position (-6.0, 8.0)

### Iron Gear Wheel Production Structure at position(-4.5, 15.5)
Consists of assembling machine at position (-4.5, 15.5)

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when placing entities at occupied or unplaceable positions:
  - Ensure the target position is clear of other entities and is not part of unplaceable terrain (such as water) before attempting to place a new entity. 
  - (New) Cannot place offshore-pump at a position as there is no offshore_pump in inventory.
* Errors when using non-existent or misplaced entities:
  - Verify that the entity you are trying to use or connect to exists and is correctly positioned.
* Errors when entities are not receiving power:
  - Ensure that the entity is connected to a power source and that the power network is functioning correctly.
* Errors due to undefined functions or variables:
  - Ensure that all functions and variables are defined before they are used in the code. 
* Errors when connecting entities with pipes:
  - Ensure that the connection points of the entities are not blocked and are correctly aligned.
  - (New) Did not find any valid connections between source Prototype.
